Name: Burial Stone
About the game: Delve into a damp dark dungeon, with your torch as your only light source, in Burial Stone. About Burial Stone is a VR tile based, tactical dungeon crawl. Fight terrifying monsters from a first person perspective, acquire equipment, weapons and gold. Learn spells and skills, gain XP, level up and improve your abilities. Combat The combat is 'you move, the others move with you' tactical style combat, reminiscent of a rogue like game. Atmosphere There is a sense of horror to these dungeons with some surprises along the way. Tread carefully.
